prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Bass, Drums, Guitar, Piano, but without Pipe.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Bass, Drums, Guitar, and Piano, but no Pipe.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Bass, Drums, Guitar, and Piano, but Pipe is absent.

Style 3:
This composition is comprised of Bass, Drums, Guitar, and Piano, Pipe excluded.
